definition: to be determined to/to insist on
to execute (a plan)/to grasp
Italy/Italian/abbr. for 意大利[Yi4 da4 li4]
idea/meaning/thought/to think/wish/desire/intention/to expect/to anticipate

sentences.english: If you do not return to the bad comments buyer insists on appeal can I do?
sentences.chinese: 如果不退货买家执意给差评我可以申诉吗？

sentences.english: Summer magnum injury has not healed, and determined to creature house looking for my sister.
sentences.chinese: 夏梦龙伤势还未愈合，执意前往神武殿寻找妹妹。

sentences.english: But the summer is determined not to move.
Instead of insisting that you hash it out at that moment, schedule a time to readdress the issue.
sentences.chinese: 不要去执意现在就解决问题，安排一个时间重新谈论。

sentences.english: We cannot guarantee the results if you do that.
sentences.chinese: 如果执意如此，我们无法保证其结果。

sentences.english: She went back home and packing all her staff with tears and broke up with him.
sentences.chinese: 含着泪，回家收拾了所有的东西，执意与他分手。

sentences.english: If someone else insists on telling you something, make sure it stops with you.
sentences.chinese: 如果其他同事执意跟你讲，确保自己不会去掺和此事。

sentences.english: She insists on going to swim.
He said it was a live pig. The woman asked to see it.
sentences.chinese: 商人声称那是头活猪，但女人执意要看。

sentences.english: Sisters listen one by one left, o good were determined to stay.
sentences.chinese: 姐妹们听完一个个离开了，阿好却执意留下。

sentences.english: An antinomian is one who insists that the law is not needed for a healthy spiritual life.
sentences.chinese: 反律法主义者执意认为，健康的属灵生活不需要律法。

sentences.english: Betancourt was stubborn, and she went ahead with her trip to talk to the rebels5.
sentences.chinese: 贝当古却执意展开她的旅程，以便和叛军对谈。

sentences.english: A number of considerations have led her to have a wilful abortion.
sentences.chinese: 多种考虑使她执意堕胎。
